    • About

        

    I was a dual degree (B.Tech + M.Tech) student at IIT Bombay from 2017 to 2022 and pursued my academic major in Electrical Engineering. I am mostly interested in Machine Learning and its applications in our daily lives. My particular interest is in the field of computer vision and I completed my Dual Degee thesis on "Domain Adaptation for Semantic Segmentation in Satellite Images" in 2022 under the supervision of Prof. Biplab Banerjee and co-supervision of Prof. Subhasis Chaudhri.

    Automating my existence is what I strive for. It is the sole reason for most of the coding and tinkering I do. Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence and, IoT (Internet of Things) are my keen interests. I am a Mathematics enthusiast who is highly intrigued by the beauty of this subject. The rest of the programming I do is for helping out friends, and sometimes just for fun :).

    In my spare time you can find me solving crossword puzzles or Sudoku, Watching TV series or taking a sound nap. I enjoy listening to music especially while working. I have always loved to read but have never been able to devote enough time to my books (I do have a collection though XD).

    Over the period of my stay at IIT Bombay, I have learnt a lot through projects. This place has also povided me with some of the best friends and I have got a bunch of them.
